itemLabel: Donald Anderson, Baron Anderson of Swansea

wikipedia_page.main: Donald Anderson, Baron Anderson of Swansea  (born 17 June 1939) is a Welsh Labour politician, who was one of the longest-serving Members of Parliament in recent years, his service totalling 34 years. Since 2005, he has served as a Labour peer in the House of Lords.
